code: import React from"react";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function subtotal(_ref){let{data,getTotal,id}=_ref;let price=data;const[count,setCount]=useState(1);function handleIncrement(){setCount(prevCount=>{return prevCount+=1;});}function handleDecrement(){setCount(prevCount=>{if(prevCount>1){return prevCount-=1;}else{return prevCount=1;}});}useEffect(()=>{setTotalAmount();},[count]);function setTotalAmount(){getTotal(count*price,id);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mycartaction",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fornumber",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"number",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{class:"minus",onClick:handleDecrement,children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{class:"plus",onClick:handleIncrement,children:"+"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"subtotaldiv",children:["Subtotal: ",count*price]})]});}export default subtotal;
